JACTATIONS,Memorandum "by the Minister of Agriculture and fisheries.With reference to CP. 845, I am advised that the provisions of the Sill may over-ride the statutory rights to., compensation given by' the Corn Production (Amendment) Act, 1918, to persons injuriously affected by action taken under the Defence of the Realm Regulations continued in force by that Act.There is. nothing in the-.-Reports-of the committee to indicate that this is intentional^ ahd I think the Bill ought to be amended tc meet this" point.. - L of F.17th March, 1920.
